segments.text: Well , Peter , you have to do better than that next time , won ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have I really got to do those exams again , Dad ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , you have . You must try harder this time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And must I go back to school ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you needn ’ t do that . You ’ d better get a part-time job somewhere and go to evening classes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But Dad , I should be working full-time at my age . I ’ m nearly 17 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ought to have worked harder then you wouldn ’ t have failed your exams . You have to take a job and study .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What else I ’ Ve got to do ? Join the army ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who knows ! That might come to later .
segments.speaker: S1
